mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM tbl_category a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_category WHERE id in(${ids})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_category(name, sortn, img, ctime, utime, isdel) VALUES(#{name}, #{sortn}, #{img}, #{ctime}, #{utime}, #{isdel})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM tbl_category a

select c.id, c.name, c.img, aw.id artid, aw.name artname from tbl_category c left join ( select a.id, a.name, a.cateid from tbl_article as a where a.isdel=0 and a.recom = 1 and #{num} > ( select count(*) from tbl_article aa where aa.isdel=0 and aa.recom=1 and aa.cateid = a.cateid and aa.id > a.id ) order by a.id desc ) as aw on c.id = aw.cateid where c.isdel=0
